description: Try our easy to follow German Apple Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: German Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, gently heat extra honey in a saucepan over high heat. Drizzle over cake and garnish with extra rosemary. Cut cake into wedges and serve warm.
